EmailTemplate.subject: New Rebate for COSTARS fleet card contract
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Did you know the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania has a statewide Universal Fleet Card Program that offers a rebate on fleet card purchases, with potential for additional rebates for Sunoco purchases?
As a COSTARS member, you’re eligible to participate in the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania Sunoco Universal Fleet Card Program. It makes fueling easy for your drivers, and fuel expense management fast and easy for you.
Save Money-Valuable rebates on all purchases, with the potential for additional rebates at Sunoco locations. Plus, it’s free to get started – no setup fees or monthly card fees
Save Time-Administrative time is reduced and fiscal reporting is made easier with detailed reporting
Easy-to-Use-24/7 customer service, plus full account online self-service
The sooner you act, the sooner you’ll start saving! To learn more about how you can participate in the Commonwealth Universal Fleet Card Program, contact me, or visit www.wrightexpress.com/pennsylvania.
Sincerely,
